name: CatholicPrayersPlus
0:
caret
”Alexa, open catholic prayers plus”
”Alexa, ask catholic prayers plus to pick a prayer”

skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: catholic prayers plus
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Listen to prayers and Bible verses from the catholic religion. Just ask it to say a prayer from the list below or you can ask it to pick one for you by saying "pick a prayer."You can also ask for a bible verse by saying "pick a bible verse."

List of Prayers:

The Lord's Prayer
Hail Mary
Glory Be
Amazing Grace
God of Heaven and Earth
Father of all Mercy
It is Well with my Soul
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
